channel.title: Giving Away 2 Killing Floor Guest Passes!
channel.description:
[b]All gone, sorry.[/b]
Like the title states, I have two Killing Floor guest passes to give away.
Each expires Jan 18th.
This time my only requirement is that you have over 50 posts. That shouldn't be too much to ask, its just a sign of forum activity. Also, a thank you post in this thread after receiving the guest pass would be nice. :wink:
Current Status: [b]Gift Pass 1: [color=red]Taken by Hazzmat Gift Pass 2: [color=red]Taken by nietzschesaurus[/b]
PM me please rather than post here, to avoid spam. When u get the account u can post a thank u here. lol

item.title: Giving Away 2 Killing Floor Guest Passes!

item.description:
Then I suggest you PM (fake banned?) Raminator.

Could this thread be closed please to prevent confusion?

item.title: Giving Away 2 Killing Floor Guest Passes!
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
lol, in case anyone really doesn’t know (im bad at detecting sarcasm, so if u were joking…) heres the links for the promotional offer.
If you have an ATi card, click here.

If you have an nVidia card, click here.

Oh, and an update on the passes: I’m awaiting a reply from a user for his email address. If I don’t receive it in… say… 12 hours, the pass is back on da market.

Read full topic

item.source: Giving Away 2 Killing Floor Guest Passes!

item.title: Giving Away 2 Killing Floor Guest Passes!
item.dc:creator: Failrar
item.description:
russilker:

Yeah, I previously gave away two other guest passes (CSS and DoDS I believe). I mean, I don’t want to use them because I HATE knowing that at a certain date, it will stop working. lol

And I can’t exactly sell them either. xD Might as well give them away.

Oh, and HL2DM (as well as HL2LC and Portal: First Slice) are available free via the ATi and nVidia promotional giveaways (and if you don’t have an ATi or nVidia, or already used it, there are ways to get “around” the hardware checks )

One is still available people…

damn

Read full topic

item.title: Giving Away 2 Killing Floor Guest Passes!
item.dc:creator: russilker
item.description:
No, its not too late (I still have one guest pass) but I’m only giving it away to active members (50+ posts).

Sorry. I know post count doesn’t make a member, but consider this a reward to those who stayed with black mesa for a while, despite it not being released yet.
